hero.description: I am a systems engineer and Full Stack developer. I love being self-taught and I am a lover of online courses and bootcamp on programming that help me day by day in my professional growth, I strive to help others, developing and going further in each and every one of the tasks. I am excited every day to grow and acquire new skills on my programming journey.
